definition: "honker", Chinese hacker motivated by patriotism, using one's skills to protect domestic networks and work in national interest

sentences.english: There are tens of thousands of Hong Ke, or red visitors, as they are known in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，这些数以万计黑客们被称为“红客”。

sentences.english: White Hat hackers are the unsung heroes of the Information Age.
sentences.chinese: 红客是信息时代的无名英雄。

sentences.english: One of his cheeks had been hacked off and hung down.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸颊被一砍而红客下来。

definition: human flesh search engine/a large-scale collective effort to find details about a person or event (Internet slang)
pinyin: ren2 rou4 sou1 suo3 yin3 qing2

definition: Trojan horse, to add malware to a website or program (computing)
shit youth/used satirically against 憤青|愤青 which shares the same sound/see also 憤青|愤青[fen4 qing1]
fifty cents party (person supposed to relay government propaganda on Internet sites)
(neologism) person who posts online in support of the Chinese government, but unlike a wumao 五毛[wu3 mao2], is not paid for doing so (abbr. for 自帶乾糧的五毛|自带干粮的五毛[zi4 dai4 gan1 liang2 de5 wu3 mao2])
secret service/special service/secret service agent/special agent
